name: Jinlei Jiang
content: Jinlei Jiang | MADSys Search Jinlei Jiang Associate Professor MADSys Bio My research interests mainly focus on distributed computing and systems, cloud computing, big data, machine learning, software-defined networking, and virtualization, with a vision to develop and synthesize various technologies to effectively support problem solving as well as human collaboration in the real world. I am currently on the editorial boards of KSII Transactions on Internet and Information Systems, International Journal on Advances in Intelligent Systems, EAI Endorsed Transactions on Industrial Networks and Intelligent Systems. Education PhD of Computer Science and Technology, 2004 Tsinghua University Bachelor of Computer Science and Technology, 1999 Tsinghua University, China Work Experience 2004-2011 Assistant Professor at the Department of Computer Science and Technology, Tsinghua University, China 2007-2008 Humboldt Research Fellow at Technical University Munich, Germany 2011-now Associate Professor at the Department of Computer Science and Technology, Tsinghua University, China Honor and Awards 2nd Class of State Technological Invention Award, 2015 Research Fellowship of Alexander von Humboldt Foundation, 2006 Best Paper Award, First China Symposium on Web Semantics and Ontology, 2006 100 Best Reviewers, Chinese Journal of Software, 2004 Outstanding Ph.D. Thesis Award, Tsinghua University, 2004 Publications
